             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-photography-en " id="post-694730">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/food-emojis-reproduced-in-real-life/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">

                <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="Neon Light Spaces by James Turrell" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/james-turrell-00-440x285.jpg"/>
                </noscript>
               </picture>
              </a>
              <div class="container-text-loop">
               <div>
                <span class="post-categories">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/category/design-en/" style="color:rgb(229,203,82);">
                  Design
                 </a>
                </span>
                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

                 </a>
                </h4>

               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/colorful-and-creative-arrangements-by-romo-jack/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Romo-440x285.jpg" alt="Colorful and Creative Arrangements by Romo Jack"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/category/design-en/" style="color:rgb(229,203,82);">
                   Design
                  </a>
                 </span>
                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-video-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/06/25/hias-for-the-refugee-2/">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology-en " id="post-690444">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/magical-starry-sky-in-new-zealand-cave/">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-graphic-en " id="post-690623">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-graphic-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/09/retro-futuristic-digital-collages-by-khan-nova/">

        <button class="btn-reset btn-open-signup">
         Join Fubiz now!
        </button>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

     <div class="logo-login">
      Fubiz
     </div>

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-video-en " id="post-689841">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-video-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/06/25/hias-for-the-refugee-2/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-440x285.jpg" alt="HIAS &#8211; For the Refugee"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

       <li class="link-menu link-technology-en" data-color-cat="rgb(128,140,209)" style="border-left-color:rgb( 128,140,209 );">
        <a class="color-hover-technology-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/category/technology-en/">
         Technology
        </a>
        <div class="sub-menu">
         <div class="content-sub-menu" style="border-top-color:rgb( 128,140,209 );">
          <div class="list-cat-menu">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology-en " id="post-690444">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/magical-starry-sky-in-new-zealand-cave/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-440x285.jpg" alt="Magical Starry Sky in New-Zealand Cave"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
         <h1 class="title-part white-title">
          Fashion Zoo Animals
         </h1>
         <div class="info-article">
          <div class="container-info-article">
           <p class="post-categories">
            <a class="waves-effect" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/category/design-en/" style="background-color: rgba(229,203,82, 0.85); border-color: rgb(229,203,82);">
             Design
            </a>
           </p>
           <span class="time">
            <time datetime="2013-03-27T16:50:31+02:00" pubdate="">
             2 years ago
            </time>
           </span>
          </div>

          <div class="content-single color-design-en">
           <article class="post loop-full" id="post-685973">
            <div class="post-content" id="post-content">
             <div class="inner-post-content">
              <p>
               Barcelona-based graphic artist Yago Partal offers photo manipulations featuring various animals in different outfits, dress from the most stylish suit to the Hawaiian shirt. Funny rendering visuals gathered under the name of
               <a href="http://www.zooportraits.com/">
                Zoo Portraits
               </a>
               to discover in the following images.
              </p>
              <p>

          <script type="text/javascript">
           var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-970x250" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-2.gif" class="image_2"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-3.gif" class="image_3"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-4.gif" class="image_4"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}
                    jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').attr('id', 'div-gpt-ad-inc-2-old');
          </script>

               </div>
              </a>

                  </span>

                 <span class="number-share">
                  <span class="icon-share">
                  </span>
                  0
                 </span>
                </small>
               </div>
              </div>
             </article>

                <img alt="Interactive Fur Mirror Sculpture" class="img-responsive" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-1-440x285.jpg" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg"/>
                <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="Interactive Fur Mirror Sculpture" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-1-440x285.jpg"/>
                </noscript>
               </picture>
               <div class="hover-img">
                <picture class="img-responsive ">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px) and (min-width:767px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="240x155" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-240x155.jpg" media="(max-width:767px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-440x285.jpg" alt="Interactive Fur Mirror Sculpture"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-440x285.jpg" alt="Interactive Fur Mirror Sculpture"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if !IE]&gt;&lt;!-->
                 <img alt="Interactive Fur Mirror Sculpture" class="img-responsive" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-440x285.jpg" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg"/>

                  <img alt="Interactive Fur Mirror Sculpture" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/pompommirror-2-440x285.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                </picture>
               </div>
              </a>

  <script>
   fire_clrz_likez_js();
function fire_clrz_likez_js(){
	jQuery('.clrz_likez[rel!=""]').each(function(){

        var el = jQuery(this);

		if(!el.hasClass('clrz_likez_active')){
			el.addClass('clrz_likez_active');
		}else {
			return 0;
		}


	    var cookievalue = readCookie('clrz_likez'+el.attr('rel'));

        if(cookievalue=='1'){
            el.addClass('bookmarked');
            el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
        }

	    if(cookievalue == null || cookievalue == '' || el.hasClass('stoplike')){
	        el.addClass('cliquable');
	        if(el.innerHTML != '...')
	            el.data('old_value', el.innerHTML);
            var params = {'post_id':el.attr('rel')};
	        if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                params.action = 'remove';
            }
	        el.on('click',function(e){
                var params = {post_id:el.attr('rel')};
	            if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                    params.action = 'remove';
	            }
	            jQuery.ajax({
	                method: 'get',
	                url: 'http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/plugins/clrz_likez/likez.php',
	                noCache:true,
                    data:params,
                    beforeSend : function(){
	                    el.addClass('loading');
	                },
                    complete : function(response){

//	                    if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
//	                        var parentel = el.getParent();
//	                        while(!parentel.hasClass('loop-mini'))
//	                            parentel = parentel.getParent();
//	                        parentel.getParent().destroy();
//	                        if($('nblikeaccount')){
//	                            $('nblikeaccount').set('html', $('nblikeaccount').get('html').toInt()-1);
//	                        }
//	                    }else{
//	                        if(response == '') response = el.data('old_value');
//	                        el.innerHTML = response;
//	                        el.removeEvents('click');
//	                        el.removeClass('//');
//	                    }
                        el.removeClass('loading');
                        el.addClass('bookmarked');
                        el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
	                }
	            });
                return false;
	        });
	    }else {
	        el.innerHTML = ''+cookievalue+'';
	    }
	});
}
  </script>
